qwoptics_workflow_example

Complete research workflow demonstrating QW optics in a realistic scenario.

This example shows a complete workflow from experimental data to analysis: 1. Load/simulate experimental field data 2. Preprocess fields (filtering, normalization) 3. Convert to QW space and calculate polarization 4. Analyze results and generate insights 5. Save results for further analysis

Purpose: Show complete research workflow from data to insight Style: Real data loading, preprocessing, analysis, visualization Audience: Researcher adapting to their own data
